name: atac_sc_10x
description: 10x scATAC peak-by-cell matrix converted to compact gene programs

inputs.name: matrix_dir
inputs.description: Directory with matrix.mtx(.gz), barcodes.tsv(.gz), peaks.bed or features.tsv(.gz)

inputs.name: cell_metadata_tsv
inputs.description: Optional per-cell metadata with barcode column and condition fields

parameters.name: dataset_label
parameters.help: Optional dataset label included in GMT names and metadata

parameters.name: cell_metadata_tsv
parameters.help: Per-cell metadata TSV with barcode column

parameters.name: condition_column
parameters.help: Condition column in cell_metadata_tsv

parameters.name: condition_a
parameters.help: Condition A label for condition_within_group

parameters.name: condition_b
parameters.help: Condition B label for condition_within_group

parameters.name: min_cells_per_condition
parameters.help: Minimum cells per condition within each group for condition_within_group

parameters.name: peak_summary
parameters.help: How to summarize per-peak accessibility within each group

parameters.name: peak_weight_transform
parameters.help: Transform applied after optional contrast statistic

parameters.name: contrast
parameters.help: Contrast mode; default resolves from preset and available metadata

parameters.name: contrast_metric
parameters.help: Peak contrast metric for group_vs_rest

parameters.name: contrast_pseudocount
parameters.help: Pseudocount for log2fc; defaults depend on peak_summary

parameters.name: link_method
parameters.help: Comma-separated linking tokens: all,promoter_overlap,nearest_tss,distance_decay,external

parameters.name: region_gene_links_tsv
parameters.help: Required when link_method includes external; columns chrom,start,end,gene_id,link_weight

parameters.name: promoter_upstream_bp
parameters.help: Promoter upstream window for promoter_overlap

parameters.name: promoter_downstream_bp
parameters.help: Promoter downstream window for promoter_overlap

parameters.name: max_distance_bp
parameters.help: Distance cap for nearest/distance modes; resolved default by link_method

parameters.name: decay_length_bp
parameters.help: Exponential decay length for distance_decay

parameters.name: max_genes_per_peak
parameters.help: Maximum linked genes per peak for distance_decay

parameters.name: program_preset
parameters.help: ATAC program family preset for additional GMT programs

parameters.name: program_methods
parameters.help: Optional explicit ATAC program methods overriding preset (linked_activity,promoter_activity,distal_activity,enhancer_bias,tfidf_distal,ref_ubiquity_penalty,atlas_residual)

parameters.name: resources_manifest
parameters.help: Optional resources manifest path

parameters.name: resources_dir
parameters.help: Optional resources cache directory

parameters.name: resource_policy
parameters.help: Behavior when a requested resource-backed method cannot load its resource

parameters.name: ref_ubiquity_resource_id
parameters.help: Resource id for ref_ubiquity_penalty (default depends on genome_build)

parameters.name: atlas_resource_id
parameters.help: Resource id for atlas_residual (default depends on genome_build)

parameters.name: atlas_metric
parameters.help: Metric used by atlas_residual

parameters.name: atlas_eps
parameters.help: Stability epsilon for atlas_residual formulas

parameters.name: select
parameters.help: Method for selecting the compact output gene program

parameters.name: top_k
parameters.help: Number of genes kept when select=top_k

parameters.name: quantile
parameters.help: Top fraction kept when select=quantile

parameters.name: min_score
parameters.help: Score threshold when select=threshold

parameters.name: emit_full
parameters.help: If true, also write geneset.full.tsv with all nonzero scores

parameters.name: normalize
parameters.help: Weight normalization mode

parameters.name: emit_gmt
parameters.help: If true, write program gene sets in GMT format

parameters.name: gmt_out
parameters.help: Output GMT path relative to out_dir/group_dir (or absolute path)

parameters.name: gmt_prefer_symbol
parameters.help: Prefer gene_symbol over gene_id when writing GMT tokens

parameters.name: gmt_require_symbol
parameters.help: Require non-Ensembl-like gene symbols for GMT tokens; drop unmapped entries

parameters.name: gmt_biotype_allowlist
parameters.help: Comma-separated allowed gene biotypes from GTF; empty string disables filter

parameters.name: gmt_min_genes
parameters.help: Minimum genes per emitted GMT set

parameters.name: gmt_max_genes
parameters.help: Maximum genes per emitted GMT set

parameters.name: gmt_topk_list
parameters.help: Comma-separated top-K plans for GMT emission

parameters.name: gmt_mass_list
parameters.help: Comma-separated HPD mass thresholds for GMT emission

parameters.name: gmt_split_signed
parameters.help: Split signed scores into positive/negative GMT plans when negatives are present

outputs.name: geneset.tsv
outputs.description: Selected compact program for each output directory

outputs.name: geneset.full.tsv
outputs.description: Optional full score table for all nonzero genes

outputs.name: genesets.gmt
outputs.description: Combined grouped GMT file at root or single-output GMT file

outputs.name: group=<GROUP>/geneset.tsv
outputs.description: Per-group program when groups_tsv is provided

outputs.name: group=<GROUP>/geneset.meta.json
outputs.description: Per-group metadata when groups_tsv is provided
